pages.body:
# List of Zites: Search Engines | [[zite-list-searches-talk|Talk]]

### Sites that index content or other sites / zites can be classified as search engines.

**[[DreamSearch]]**

**[[Horizon]]**

Now, this is the newest

**[Important Zites](/1MiS3ud9JogSQpd1QVmM6ETHRmk5RgJn6E/)**
User-added zites, fast relevance-based searching with pagination, modern design, bookmarks. ZeroSites with more features (including search and bookmarks) and a better interface. Also ability to search other zites, including ZeroSites, Kiwipedia, 0List, ZeroTalk, ZeroDevTalk, and ZeroUp.
 * Zite Address: 1MiS3ud9JogSQpd1QVmM6ETHRmk5RgJn6E

**[Zirch Automated Search](/1SearchPd3khzLtsxTxKYhYUohk7c1QYd)**
Zirch is the first  fully automated search for zeronet, it crawls zeronet everyday to update it's index, and includes previews. 
 * Zite Address: 1SearchPd3khzLtsxTxKYhYUohk7c1QYd
 * Zite Discussion: [0List](/0list.bit/?Topic:5_1A3XsuLB6P7LQPCw1QWASG7RGSwrCv6Xib/Automated+Search+Engine)
 * Zite Domain: zirch.bit

**[Kaffiene Search](/search.kaffie.bit/).**  
Kaffiene Search is a zite that allows users to search an index of predefined sites for keywords and other terms. Kaffiene Search provides such features as browsing the zite through a proxy and listings sorted by peer popularity count.  
  * Zite Address:   1Mr5rX9TauvaGReB4RjCaE6D37FJQaY5Ba  
  * Zite Discussion: 
[0List](/0list.bit/?Topic:2_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh/Kaffiene+Search+Engine), 
[ZeroCentral](/1Dt7FR5aNLkqAjmosWh8cMWzJu633GYN6u/?Topic:1_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh/Kaffiene+Search), 
ZeroTalk  
  * Zite Domain: 
kaffiene.bit, search.kaffie.bit

**[ZeroSearch](/zerosearch.bit).**  
ZeroSearch is the original implementation of a search engine to Zeronet. Visitors are allowed to submit their zite.  
  * Zite Address:   1ZeroeuDnL2jNS6t1epQa1SPvC91KG8ER  
  * Zite Discussion: 
0List, 
ZeroCentral, 
[ZeroTalk](/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topics:5_1PNyuY1iZqXBpft4ArouqcnE4pNRGYij5i/ZeroSearch+bit+sub+topic)  
  * Zite Domain: 
zerosearch.bit 

**[CensoredSearch](/1LC3ryygCrv94ZK4Nk8ELW6vE1hKwopE8T/).**  
CensoredSearch is a search engine that uses an index of clearnet sites that allows visitors to use search terms of specific sites. The source of these sites have been gathered through various News sources so website blocking of specific sites can vary by region. The zite also provides a page that offers multiple ways to bypass website censorship efforts.  
  * Zite Address:   1LC3ryygCrv94ZK4Nk8ELW6vE1hKwopE8T  
  * Zite Discussion: 
[0List](/0list.bit/?Topic:1_16bxMyoL49mWYhcZKBYVBT5zEFW9SQpiao/Censored+Search+bit), 
[ZeroCentral](/1Dt7FR5aNLkqAjmosWh8cMWzJu633GYN6u/?Topic:1_16bxMyoL49mWYhcZKBYVBT5zEFW9SQpiao/Censored+Search), 
ZeroTalk,  
  * Zite Domain: 
censoredsearch.bit  

[Fuji - Free & Cloneable](/1AWAXiVLbcuncGbpyiUmDbAUpBB4r6KPKL/)

[ZSearch](/1NnopBFkeLnBUSAwcvxPCizSaqEnHFcEPH/)

[ZeroExpose Search Engine](http://zeroexposedcuclo.onion/) (Tor onion service)

**[RVRE](/bwoi.bit/).**  
RVRE is a simple search engine that allows anyone to search through an index of zites.
  * Zite Address:   1f7FYxZWSZ5YG7Nd8sGsHcWEQgvdnVvQF
  * Zite Domain: 
bwoi.bit

**[EulerFinder](/13eFkhbXXQcJqd729zRLL9tMxxhz9d4UA6/).**  
Installs Javascript cryptocurrency miner. New search engine for ZeroNet, lightweight and fast.

zearch unlike on the normal web where website are hosted in a central server and "search" since its decentralized and served by peers the terminology used is zearch

## See also
* [[DreamSearch]]
* [[Zirch]]
* [[EulerFinder]]
* [[RVRE]]
* [[Zoogle Zearch]]
* [[Kaffiene]]
* [[Kidsearch]]
* [[bwoi]]
* [[ZeroSearch]]
* [[Snifferdog]]
- [[Horizon]] (newest,developing,crawling 2019)

zearch unlike on the normal web where website are hosted in a central server and "search" since its decentralized and served by peers the terminology used is zearch

## See also
*[Dream Search](?Page:dreamsearch)*
* [[Zirch]]
* [[EulerFinder]]
* [[RVRE]]
* [[Zoogle Zearch]]
* [[Kaffiene]]
* [[Kidsearch]]
* [[bwoi]]
* [[ZeroSearch]]
* [[Snifferdog]]
- [[Horizon]] (newest,developing,crawling 2019)

Dream Search
 =======
![Image AltText](//proxy.duckduckgo.com/iu/?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn130.picsart.com%2F262704037007212.png%3Fr1024x1024&f=1&nofb=1 "Dream Search logo")

[Dream Search](/1JBFNPrAGp1nQX6RsAN6oRqCfvtoeWoion) is the most data scanning search engine and yet still fast and light,
search engine does 2 kinda searches in client side which are
- fast search to scan only site main pages
- deep search (indicator at top right will be shown) that performs deep search for all pages,topics found by crawler

## News
If you want to search even deeper you have to [disable sites blacklist from settings](/1MeFqFfFFGQfa1J3gJyYYUvb5Lksczq7nH/?Post/1MoonP8t4rk9QamBUPh5Aspkwa1Xhf5ux2/13SFxfKtzbvyUWADdNZs3oKh1YSJwmohWm/1568855665)

## Current search data
- Current search data is 19 th september 2019

## Extra features
- To set search engine as default search engine for firefox
